stories.title: View Financial Overview
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my financial overview so that I can quickly understand my balance and credit status

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the dashboard page is loaded, Then a section with text 'Financial Overview' should be visible
Given the Financial Overview section is visible, Then 'Total Balance', 'Credit Available', and 'Due Today' with their corresponding amounts should be displayed
Given the 'Total Balance' is displayed, Then an indicator showing percentage change should be visible, reflecting daily or monthly variation
Given 'Total Balance', When the user clicks 'View Statement', Then the statement page should be navigated to
Given 'Credit Available', When the user clicks 'Request Increase', Then a request form or page should be displayed

stories.title: Make a Payment
stories.description: As a user, I want to make a payment so that I can manage my due amounts

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the dashboard page is loaded, When the user clicks the 'Make Payment' button, Then a payment form should be displayed

stories.title: View Recent Transactions
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my recent transactions so that I can track my spending history

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the dashboard page is loaded, Then a section with text 'Recent Transactions' should be visible
Given the Recent Transactions section is visible, Then columns for 'STATUS', 'DATE', 'DESCRIPTION', 'CATEGORY', and 'AMOUNT' should be present
Given a transaction is listed, When the user views the row, Then appropriate icons and colors for transaction status should be displayed

stories.title: Add New Account
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new account so that I can manage multiple financial profiles

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the dashboard page is loaded, When the user clicks the 'Add Account' button, Then an account creation form should be displayed
